## [Plotting Confidence Intervals](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/14069629/plotting-confidence-intervals)

```{r,eval=F}
install.packages("plotrix")
```



```{r}
library(plotrix)
set.seed(0815)
x <- 1:10
F <- runif(10,1,2) 
L <- runif(10,0,1)
U <- runif(10,2,3)

require(plotrix)
plotCI(x, F, ui=U, li=L)
```
